Articles.Content:
My totalitarian military goes into space to [@greenTurtle1134](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/167701-greenturtle1134/) and takes the hill with it.

Our interplanetary floating hill.

I land a spaceplane on Laythe, step out of it and claim the nearest hill.

Everyone can keep their hills.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-29T17:41:43Z" title="10/29/2016 05:41  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 29, 2016</time> by ZentroCatson**

Bent on galactic domination, I send in troops and take over [@ZentroCatson](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143939-zentrocatson/)'s hill, enslaving everyone on it like the Egyptians.

I fly an ssta to Laythe and free the slaves. I then take down [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/)  and banish him to Pol.

My Laythe Hill.

I return to Laythe where my army has been planning to overthrow [@Firemetal](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164725-firemetal/). We do so and conquer the other Joolian moons.

My Jool empire.

I escape and capture Jool itself. I use its atmosphere to create powerful weapons to destroy all five of the moons. I then build a large battlestation in orbit of Jool.

My battlestation.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-30T00:44:49Z" title="10/30/2016 12:44  AM" data-short="7 yr">October 30, 2016</time> by Firemetal**

A new totalitarian government rises on Kerbin, led by rocket scientist Wernher von Kerman and Dinkelstein Kerman. They launch a rocket to Jool and plunge a nuclear reactor into it, turning it into a star and vaporizing your battlestation.

My interplanetary empire.
I make a pile of dirt and call it a hill. My hill.

I hide in a rest room until the war is over. Then I step out of it and claim a pile of smoking debris as my hill.

My hill.

Little did [@ZentroCatson](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143939-zentrocatson/) know, the now Interstellar Empire survived.

My smoking debris hill.

I use a device which tears the universe apart.

My collection of elementary particles.
The partices begin to form into me and my hill after 200,000,000 years.

Suddenly, they are interrupted by the spontaneous coalescence of an apple pie.

My apple pie, island of order in a sea of entropy.

Nice pie! Life gave me lemons.

My lemons.

I make lemonade out of those lemons.

My lemonade.

I drank that lemonade.

In my cup.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-02T13:53:12Z" title="11/02/2016 01:53  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 2, 2016</time> by TopHeavy11**

I take your cup while you weren't looking and ran off.

My cup.

You hit a brick wall face first.

My wall.

Your wall falls down due to lack of mortar.

My pile of bricks

I sell my soul to basement cat. He returns the world to its previous state and gives me a hill.

My hill.

I go to your hill and steal one of the cups from your cupboards.

My cup.

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, TopHeavy11 said:
> 
> 
> I drank that lemonade.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> In my cup.
> 

Not all things yellow and in a cup are lemonade... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

![sandwich-scraps.jpg](http://www.achildgrows.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/sandwich-scraps.jpg)

Nothing like a good [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) to take care of hunger. After a quick meal, I step down off the hill, leaving a void.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-02T22:04:55Z" title="11/02/2016 10:04  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 2, 2016</time> by adsii1970**

I make another sandwich.

My sandwich.

[Edit: By the way, how did we get from solar cannons blowing up asteroidal moons to eating sandwiches and drinking lemonade?]

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-03T00:20:05Z" title="11/03/2016 12:20  AM" data-short="7 yr">November 3, 2016</time> by The Raging Sandwich**
I drop a thermonuclear warhead on your sandwich. My irradiated and atomized elements that once were a sandwich.

I go back to my human form after mass sandwich genocide. I also wear a trench coat and goofy moustache-glasses as a disguise.

My human body.
